doc.title: Constellation Dreams: A Ride on the Connie
doc.plot: Experience the sights and sounds of flying on board a fully restored Lockheed L-1049 Super-G Constellation classic 1950's Airliner the "Star of America". A bonus segment includes a 15 minute look at the Constellation's recent return to John F. Kennedy Airport in New York as part of TWA's 75th Anniversary. This was the 1st time in 33 years a passenger Connie, in Trans World Airlines colors, has landed at JFK since TWA's last Connie flight out in 1967!
